fn.p: Note: All values are means and standard deviations unless otherwise noted.

Abbreviations: GAD, generalized anxiety disorder; HC, healthy controls; IP, individuals with internalizing psychopathology; MDD, major depressive disorder; PD, panic disorder; PTSD, posttraumatic stress disorder; RewP, reward positivity; SAD, social anxiety disorder.
